directions: Simmer water with rice and cinnamon sticks for 20 minutes.  Discard the rice and cinnamon, reserve the water.  Return the water to the stove, and add the apple; simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.

Add the cherries and raspberries, then bring to a boil before removing from the heat.  Allow to stand for at least 30 minutes before refrigerating.  Serve cold, garnished with a dollop of whipped cream.
ingredients: 1/2 cup uncooked long grain white rice
1 large apple, peeled, cored, and diced
1 (15 ounce) can pitted dark sweet cherries
title: Norwegian Fruit Soup
